(Code (I say Code because the name "Hollywood Narrator" is just strange) is 
correct, your arguments are just stupid.  You have no right to bash G1.  Your 
little 'review' of the Transformers movie clearly shows you have zero 
knowledge of G1.  Well, those of us that are responding to your lame comments 
have knowledge of G1 and we've all watched BW and Bm so technically we are 
more qualified to make those kind of calls.  We've seen the awesome G1 
epsidoes, the good BW episodes, and the lame as hell BM.

Also yeah, Scourge got his hand on the Matrix in "The Burden Hardest To 
Bare", the only episode where Rodimus/Hot Rod is actually kinda cool.  It 
mutated Scourge into a superpowerful robot, well, kind of, he still seemed 
like a wuss.  And it just gave him a really bad case of acne.  It didn't 
destroy him though.  As far as I know the Matrix was never destroyed, just 
depleted to defeat the Hate Plague.  I'm 99.9% sure of it, but I haven't seen 
every Season 3 ep so I won't say I'm 100%.)
